I found this place in the neighborhood from a recommendation from a friend. From the first time my family and I stepped in we felt wanted and welcomed. They have a great menu with a nice variety of items. I've eaten breakfast, lunch and dinner and have been happy with all of it. They have lovely decor with very friendly staff. They are open all the time. Honestly don't know how they do it. I can't recommend this place enough. This is what a restaurant should be. Outside dining is small but indoor seating is plentiful. Don't take my word for it, go find out for yourself but make reservations for popular dining hours. They do fill up.
